author: Reuters Editorial
title: UK government does not see Capita heading same way as Carillion - PM's spokesman
text:
January 31, 2018 / 1:26 PM / a day ago UK government does not see Capita heading same way as Carillion - PM's spokesman Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
LONDON, Jan 31 (Reuters) - The British government monitors the financial health of all its strategic suppliers and does not believe that any, including Capita, are in a comparable position to Carillion, a spokesman for Prime Minister Theresa May said on Wednesday. 
“Broadly we monitor the financial health of all our strategic suppliers, including Capita, and we are in regular discussions with them regarding their financial position,” the spokesman told reporters, after Capita shares fell sharply on news of a restructuring. “And (I would like) to emphasise we do not believe that any of our strategic suppliers including Capita are in a comparable position to Carillion.” Reporting by Elizabeth Piper; Editing by Elisabeth O'Leary
